dbDAO

Class ConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbDAO.ConnectionPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConnectionPool
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the class which provide connection to the DB and also close all the connection. it's a singleTone type of class which means that there is only one appearance of this class.
    Author:
    user
    See Also:

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeAllConection()
      this method is closing all the connections to the DB.
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      this getConnection method is assigned to supply connection to the DB to all comer it synchronized on a key object and in case there is no available connections it will send the requesting thread to wait and when the connection is returning it also notify the waiting thread .
      static ConnectionPool getInstance()
      this getInstance method returning the instance of this class if the instance is been taken once it will provide the same instance again that how it remaining as a singleTone.
      void returnConnection(java.sql.Connection con)
      this method is receiving a connection and set it back to the connections Set it also notify to the key object for the occasion that there is a thread that wait for connection.

        public static ConnectionPool getInstance()
                                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                         java.sql.SQLException
        this getInstance method returning the instance of this class if the instance is been taken once it will provide the same instance again that how it remaining as a singleTone. it also a static method for the reason that it would be possible to get instance. it is also synchronized to tackle multiThread condition.

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                         java.sql.SQLException,
                                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        this getConnection method is assigned to supply connection to the DB to all comer it synchronized on a key object and in case there is no available connections it will send the requesting thread to wait and when the connection is returning it also notify the waiting thread . eventually it returning the connection and remove it from the Setconnections
        Returns:
        Connection
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.sql.SQLException

        public void returnConnection(java.sql.Connection con)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        this method is receiving a connection and set it back to the connections Set it also notify to the key object for the occasion that there is a thread that wait for connection.
        Parameters:
        con -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • closeAllConection

        public void closeAllConection()
        this method is closing all the connections to the DB. first it will update the boolean allowedConnection to false than it will wait for 2 seconds to the connections to come back and than it will pass on all the connections Set and close them one by one. it also synchronized on the key object for the reason that no one be able to take connection while it close them.
